\usepackage{xcolor}
\definecolor{redtea}{rgb}{0.6823529412,0.2792156863,0.2666666667}
\usepackage{siunitx}
\usepackage{changepage}


\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}
\begin{axis}[
width=\linewidth,
grid=major,
grid style={dashed,gray!30},
xlabel=\raisebox{-2ex}{Wavelength [\si{\nm}]},
ylabel=Absorbance,
x unit=,
y unit=,
legend style={at={(0.5,-0.2)},anchor=north},
x tick label style={rotate=90,anchor=east},
]
\addplot[redtea] table [smooth,col sep=comma,x=Wavelength (nm), y=Absorbance (AU),mark=none] {data};
\end{axis}
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
